member.name: StringAlignment
member.summary: The StringAlignment enumeration specifies how a string is aligned in reference to the bounding rectangle. A bounding rectangle is used to define the area in which the text displays.

member.name: StringAlignment.StringAlignmentNear
member.summary: Specifies that alignment is towards the origin of the bounding rectangle. May be used for alignment of characters along the line or for alignment of lines within the rectangle. For a right to left bounding rectangle (), the origin is at the upper right.

member.name: StringAlignment.StringAlignmentCenter
member.summary: Specifies that alignment is centered between origin and extent (width) of the formatting rectangle.

member.name: StringAlignment.StringAlignmentFar
member.summary: Specifies that alignment is to the far extent (right side) of the formatting rectangle.
